attributes.additional_details: I do not believe that it is right for the social services to come and take your child away from a loving family were the child is well looked after, clean, good behaviour and very intelligent. My family as got a week then they have t face the dreaded moment when my cousin may be removed which will hurt a lot of people. He is also doing well at school but social services are trying through lies and deceit to take him instead of concentrating on children that are getting abused they are picking on innocent children this needs to stop! I
